name: Push & Pull (Demo)
description:
Players take on the roles of the brothers: Push and Pull and make their way through the different puzzles using their unique abilities. Push has the power to move Pull away from him. Similarly, Pull can move Push toward him. Can you work together to solve these puzzles?

This is a single or co-op game. As of now, single players must use the keyboard to control both characters. If playing with a friend, both players can use a controller each, or just share each half of the keyboard.

Single Player Controls:

  • Move Character: Left Analog Stick / Left and Right Arrows
  • Jump: A Button / Up Arrow
  • Use Other Character's Power: B Button / Left Shift
  • Switch Character: Y Button / Tab
  • Show Guideline: X Button / Space
  • Pause: Start / Esc

Multi-Player Controls:

  • Move Character: Left Analog Stick / Left and Right Arrows or A and D
  • Jump: A Button / Up Arrow or W
  • Use Respective Character's Power: B Button / Left Shift or Right Shift
  • Show Guideline: X Button / Space
  • Pause: Start / Esc

*This is a demo. No release date has been decided yet for the final product. Please feel free to contact me with any questions or comments, and donate if you wish to help with the development of this game.

Feel free to follow Push & Pull here
